= camel update list

List available update versions for Camel and its runtime variants


== Usage

[source,bash]
----
camel update list [options]
----



== Options

[cols="2,5,1,2",options="header"]
|===
| Option | Description | Default | Type
| `--json` | Output in JSON Format |  | boolean
| `--repo,--repos` | Additional maven repositories for download on-demand (Use commas to separate multiple repositories) |  | String
| `--use-cache` | Use Maven cache |  | boolean
| `-h,--help` | Display the help and sub-commands |  | boolean
|===
